attributes.action: deliver a new site and building for Devenish College in Enniskillen co. Fermanagh
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Devenish College was promised a new site and building for the academic year 2008. This has not been delivered and has resulted in the students of this school being educationally deprived. It is imperative that new facilities are created imminently so that the pupils get the 21st century facilities necessary for a 21st century education.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
